intension: Design a holiday-themed gift card to promote the sale of gift boxes and packaging for the Christmas in July event. Include the website address www.yourbrand.com and store name.
globalcaption: The image features a stack of three wrapped presents, each with a different color. The presents are placed on top of each other, creating a visually appealing display. The first present is on the bottom, followed by the second one, and the third one is on top. The presents are tied with ribbons, adding to the festive and gift-giving atmosphere.
keywords: gift, box, store, offer, service, tb, tbo, instagram, insta, ig, post, present, surprise, sale, discount, giveaway, christmas, july, holiday, gift boxes, packaging

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a red ribbon and a gold bow on top of it. The red ribbon is placed in the middle of the scene, while the gold bow is positioned towards the right side. The combination of the red ribbon and gold bow creates a visually appealing contrast against the white background

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a stack of four different colored boxes, each with a bow on top. The boxes are arranged in a pyramid shape, with the largest box at the bottom and the smallest box at the top. The colors of the boxes are red, green, and gold, creating a visually appealing display. The bows on the boxes are of different sizes and colors, adding to the overall festive and decorative appearance of the scene
